root.name: Mechanized Attack
root.description: Debug ModeBy holding down Down/Left/B/Select on controller 1 and Right/A/B on controller 2 a debug mode can be accessed. Music and sound effects can be toggled, and starting lives, bombs, and level can be selected.This debug mode also comes with an image of a woman wearing a coat and a dress. By setting specific values into the menu her clothing will be removed until the point where she is wearing nothing at all.
